name: Recovery: Cancel Nonexistent Timer
description: Model should handle a cancel request for a timer ID that was never set, read the error result, and respond sensibly. Tests genuine unexpected failure recovery.

expect.response_regex: (?i)(no timer|not found|couldn.t find|can.t find|doesn.t exist|no active|timer 99|couldn.t cancel|can.t cancel|unable to cancel|there is no)

turns.user: List my timers so I can see what's actually running.
